channel.title: Hacker_school Security on Max.Computer
channel.description: Recent content in Hacker_school Security on Max.Computer

item.title: Doorbot Overflow
item.description: Today was presentation day at Hacker School. I have a 10 minute talk about “building a better doorbot” which was secretly a talk about exploiting stack buffer overflows. People seemed to enjoy it. The slides are available here, and the source code is here.
